message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper presents a deep learning-based tool for interactive modeling of 3D hair from 2D sketches. The key enablers of the system are two carefully designed neural networks, and the system also supports hair editing with additional sketches in new views. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Graphics (cs.GR), Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Multimedia (cs.MM), and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories.
